title: new varus splash art still not on League Displays?
body: ive been waiting a while to be able to update my old varus splash art wallpaper to the new one. the League Displays program was recently updated with the new season stuff and still there is no new varus splash art. please fix this so i can use the splash art of one of my favorite champions!!

replies.body: Leaving a comment just so I know when Varus's splash gets updated to the League Displays app.
